display_long_description:
Rescue The HOLES is an indie escape puzzle game where you have to help rescue and navigate cute ring-like characters, known as "HOLES", through a series of pipes, traps and other dangers! With our new level maker in v3.0, you can now design your own levels with your creativity!

There are various difficulty modes which you can select:

Easy - Each HOLE recovers its HP, after taking damage.
Normal - HOLES do not recover, with a finite HP.
Hard - HOLES only take 1 hit.

There are currently 50+ levels of various skill levels, with more to come in the future!

1) Beginner (Green)
2) Intermediate (Yellow)
3) Hard (Red)
4) Insane (Purple)
5) Evil (Black)

Current Features:

1) Pipes - Avoid coming into contact with the pipes, these deal frictional damage to the HOLES.
2) Traps - Avoid the traps that deal maximum damage!
3) Junction switches - Find and activate the switches to cross-junctions and obstacles to reach the final destination.
4) Fattening cheese - Grow bigger to overcome bigger pipes
5) Chains - Navigate 2 holes that are chained together
6) Ghost pipes - Holes can touch and navigate freely
7) Pimple - Show where the holes last contacted with pipes before perishing
8) Passthrough - Toggle between Mixed Reality and VR mode

NEW! Level Maker!

Create your own fun levels and share it with your friends using our newest level maker! Design creative pipe paths and traps which we have yet to think of!

Thank you for your support!
